manipulators.description: Ctrl + U to delete backward from point to the beginning of line.
Ctrl + W to delete word behind point

rules.description: Ctrl + B/F to move between words

manipulators.description: Ctrl + W to delete word behind point
Ctrl + W to delete word behind point

rules.description: Quick access to frequently used bindings in left hand

manipulators.description: left_command to option+command+control+right_shift, send right_control+left_arrow on tap
right_command to option+command+control+right_shift, send right_control+right_arrow on tap
left_shift+spacebar to option+command+control+right_shift, send right_option+e on tap
spacebar to option+command+control+right_shift, send f13 on tap

rules.description: SUPER keys for Sticky Mods and quick access to the bindings I use most often in left hand
SUPER keys for Sticky Mods and quick access to the bindings I use most often in right hand
Symbols and arrows in right hand

manipulators.description: left_command to left_shift, send spacebar on tap
right_command to , send escape on tap
